Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory548.jpg'}

{3: 'Aware of the importance of posture when entering the water from a significant height, you try your best to cradle the fragile body in your arms and maintain a vertical position, hoping to minimize the severity of injuries from the high fall.'}
{3: 'Even with a perfect posture to enter the water, there are limits to the height that one can safely handle.'}
{3: 'A violent shock surges through your body, originating from the soles, as if a heavy hammer relentlessly smashes against your fragile bones, piercing through the flesh.'}
{3: 'Your organs are compressed upward, causing a turbulent rush of blood and air. The instinctive attempt to cough only brings forth suffocating pain.'}
{3: 'The pain, though intense, is fleeting. Seawater surges into your trachea, and the shock extends to your skull as if a pinball is vigorously bouncing and colliding within your brain.'}
{3: 'In an instant, your consciousness slips away.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'After an indeterminate period of time, you feel something cold touching your cheek.'}
{3: 'Despite the desire to roll to the side, the excruciating pain, tearing through every muscle, prevents you from moving even an inch.'}
{3: 'The same pain, however, brings you back to your senses.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Um... You'd better not move around."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3901_40.jpg'}
{3: 'Slowly opening your eyes, your gaze is met by the sight of a giant fishtail shimmering with deep and light blue hues.'}

{3: 'As you glance upward, your eyes fall upon a trident that emanates a cold light, resembling more of a regal scepter than a traditional weapon. The chilling sensation you felt earlier seems to come from it.'}

{3: 'Finally, with a slight lift of your neck, you catch sight of a face that appears faintly familiar. Sea waves crash against the rocks behind her, shattering into sprays of white foam that envelop her like a delicate veil.'}
{3: "A guess begins to form in your mind, drawing upon your previous encounter with Alpha's transformation. The same idea may not be entirely impossible for another Ascendant to..."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'You recognized me?'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "You already have the answer, don't you?"}
{3: 'After you hear her response, many pieces of the puzzle suddenly start to align.'}
{3: 'The strange behavior of the child, the abrupt breakage of the pile driver, and the sudden appearance of the Punishing Virus.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'I never thought you could change your body size to such an extent now.', 3: '40'}
{2: "What's the purpose of the Ascendants infiltrating that refugee camp?", 3: '41'}
{3: "As the human's voice takes on a cold and stern tone, Lamia tightens her grip on her weapon."}
{3: 'She has no intent to launch an attack. Instead, only holding something tightly can bring her some sense of ease.'}
{3: 'Too many things have slipped through her fingers. The tighter she holds onto those tiny little joys, the more they crumble like seafoam.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I can't tell you..."}
{3: 'Lamia lowers her eyes, no longer daring to look into the eyes of the person before her.'}
{3: 'Even though the human is no stronger than a cat with broken bones, completely at her mercy.'}
{3: "But why can't she meet that gaze... Is it because of what happened in the past?"}
{3: "The human's gaze mirrors the resilience in the person's eyes in the fortress, and yet, there is something different... What is it?"}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "You saved me just now, didn't you?", 3: '53'}
{2: 'At least, I need to thank you for that.', 3: '54'}
{3: 'The sudden expression of gratitude leaves Lamia frozen in place, uncertain whether it is a genuine sentiment or a concealed plea for mercy.'}
{3: "She lacks Roland's ability to pry secrets out of people, nor does she possess Alpha's insight to see through hearts."}
{3: 'All she has is... an insignificant... yearning for love.'}
{3: 'So even though it can be just a lie or mere temporary politeness, she is willing to believe it.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "It's... it's okay?"}
{3: 'Once stripped of the "Elene" guise, Lamia retreats into a withdrawn state.'}
{3: 'As if harboring a fear of being hurt, she speaks cautiously, showing none of the demeanor expected of an Ascendant.'}
{3: 'She is used to it, anyway.'}
{2: 'Can I ask you a question?', 3: '63'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "If it's about the Ascendants..."}
{3: "Lamia's words are left unfinished, as she believes the person can understand her intent."}
{2: "It's about you.", 3: '66'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I... I can try to answer.'}
{3: "Suddenly, as if a memory of someone's teachings rushes back to her, Lamia adds some words in a fluster."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I... I have a question for you too, one each... or maybe you can have one more... but no more than that...'}
{3: 'Her voice trails off, lost amid the sound of the waves.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'One for each, then.', 3: '72'}
{2: 'Hmm... Does that refugee camp have anything to do with you?', 3: '73'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'So you just believe that?'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Combining what I've seen myself.", 3: '78'}
{2: "I'll take your word for it.", 3: '79'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Um... It's my turn..."}
{2: "I've already answered your question.", 3: '81'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "You... you're playing unfair."}
{3: 'Lamia lets out a soft protest, and despite being the one voicing her objection, she seems more restless. Her tail flutters nervously in the water, betraying her inner turmoil.'}
{3: 'The human across from her responds with a quiet smile. Lamia then realizes that it might just be a lighthearted joke.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Then... then I'll continue... Why did you help me at first?"}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Because I didn't see through your disguise.", 3: '88'}
{2: 'I thought you were a victim.', 3: '89'}
{3: 'A straightforward, honest answer.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Then... if you knew I was an Ascendant from the start, would you still have treated me the same?'}
{3: 'Her question comes hesitantly, accompanied by a noticeable tremble in her voice as she even forgets the rule of taking turns.'}
{3: "Even though she expects such an answer, the human's decisive attitude still sparks in Lamia a desire to run away."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'But?'}
{3: "The person's tone takes a sudden turn, igniting a small flame within her. Lamia shifts her gaze back at the human lying on the ground."}
{2: 'I don\'t regret helping "Elene".', 3: '98'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Even though she was just a shell filled with lies?'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I don't understand. Shouldn't kindness be given to those who are also kind?"}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Lies, deceit, and betrayal should be punished from the start.'}
{2: 'Then how can we know if someone is kind?', 3: '103'}
{3: "Lamia is a master of disguise, capable of adopting anyone's appearance."}
{3: 'However, her ability of disguise only extends to the surface level, as she neither dares nor desires to speculate or delve deeper into the thoughts of others.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Can you tell that?'}
{2: "I can't either.", 3: '108'}
{3: 'The human shakes their head.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'All I have is a brain to discern right from wrong...', 3: '111'}
{2: 'And a heart unafraid of getting hurt.', 3: '112'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Unafraid of getting hurt... If you know you will get hurt, why still do it?'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'If no one reaches out first...', 3: '115'}
{2: 'This world will be too cold.', 3: '116'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'For things like this...'}
{3: 'Lamia wants to say more but is interrupted by the sound reaching her ears—a cacophony of noises emanating from several Constructs descending the cliff.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I... I have to go.'}
{2: 'You still owe me two questions.', 3: '120'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Uh... Hurry up, then!'}
{2: 'Why did you save me?', 3: '122'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Because...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elite Construct', 3: 'Commandant spotted with... an Ascendant!!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Several lasers instantly lock onto Lamia, and if not for the presence of the human commandant nearby, a tempest of bullets would have already fallen upon her.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I have to leave now... Let's save the questions for next time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia leaps back into the sea, leaving behind only a tiny splash.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory784.jpg'}
{3: 'She chases the reflection of the stars in the water, not resurfacing until the shore is nearly out of sight.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Gazing toward the shore, she observes the lively figures amidst the dazzling lights that shimmer like sunlight.'}
{3: "As she watches the distant interplay of light and shadow in silence, she slowly voices the answer she couldn't have the chance to give earlier."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Because... I want you to live.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She finally understands why she was avoiding that gaze all the while yearning for it.'}

{3: 'Souls that have never been given any importance often yearn for a profound connection with the world—something that serves as proof of their existence, redemption from the suffocating depths of solitude.'}
{3: 'Lamia suddenly recalls a poem she had read in the past, its meaning once elusive to her.'}
{3: 'As the lights on the shore gradually fade away, Lamia remains fixated on the diminishing glow. Inwardly, she whispers to herself.'}
{1: 'Be a guiding light, for you never know who might use it to escape from their endless night.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Let kindness bloom in your heart, for you never know who might use it to break free from despair.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: "Carry a beacon of faith in the haze, for you never know who might use it to walk through life's maze.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'Believe in your own strength, for you never know who might start believing in themselves because of you...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{3: 'Over time, the light dissipates, marking the end of this serendipitous encounter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Probably, there won't be a next time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia casts one final glance toward the direction where the figure disappeared from her sight, and dives into the lightless depths of the sea.'}
